data.name: 来人 LIGHTWORKERS
data.detailed_description:
SYNOPSIS:

On New Year's Eve of Showa 1 (1926), Hiroshi meets Kiyoshi, his guardian angel. Following his advice, Hiroshi reunites with his cousins for the first time since the Great Kanto Earthquake. In his new life with his relatives, Hiroshi gradually recognizes his destiny and embarks on a journey to fulfill his life's purpose.

*The story, all characters, places and incidents portrayed in this game are fictitious. Any resemblance to actual persons, places or events are merely coincidental.

PROLOGUE: Ghosts of Sagami

In the fall of Taisho 15 (1926), Hana and Kuyoin head to Sagami Castle Ruins after hearing about ghost sightings and find two ghost wolves. Hana sees the ghost wolves’ "residual memories" from their pasts, learning that the two wolves, covered in blood, delivered letters to Sagami Castle and then died there.

CHAPTER 1: Guardian Angel

On New Year's Eve of Showa 1 (1926), Hiroshi encounters a man named Kiyoshi. Kiyoshi claims that he's a guardian angel and came to help him. Though sceptical, Hiroshi follows Kiyoshi's advice and gets reunited with his relatives for the first time since the Great Kanto Earthquake.

CHAPTER 2: Ghost of Yokohama

In the winter of Showa 2 (1927), Hana & Kuyoin invite Hiroshi to Mutsurenji Temple. They tell Hiroshi the truth about their Astronomy Club and encourage him to become a member. A few days later, they find out about a ghost sighting in Yokohama and head to Yokohama Castle Ruins.

CHAPTER 3: Ghost of Kawasaki

In the summer of Showa 4 (1929), Hiroshi comes back from an exorcism at Kawasaki Castle Ruins and meets Kiyoshi at the temple. Kiyoshi reveals to Hiroshi what destiny awaits him. After learning of his destiny for the first time, Hiroshi is determined to fulfill his life's mission.

CHAPTER 4: Ghost of Shinagawa

On New Year's Eve of Showa 4 (1929), the party heads to Shinagawa Castle Ruins. Not being able to capture the ghost of Shiyun, Hiroshi pins his hope on Leo to find and exorcise Shiyun. Then, Kiyoshi appears out of the blue and tells Hiroshi what he must do to save Shiyun.

EPILOGUE: The Gojo Association

In Showa 14 (1939), about 10 years after the formation of the Gojo Association, Kiyoshi visits Hana and Kuyoin at Seiraikan Inn. Kiyoshi says that he has something very important to tell them. At first, Hana and Kuyoin think Kiyoshi has bad news, but instead he reveals the future of the Gojo Association.

FEATURES

- 2D Visual Novel / Adventure
- Dialogue-Heavy
- One Ending
- Several Puzzles to Solve per Chapter
- Soundtrack and SFX
- Auto-Save at Checkpoints
- Completely Free! No Registration!

PLAYTIME

PROLOGUE: 30 mins~1 hour
CHAPTER1: 30 mins~1 hour
CHAPTER2: 1~2 hours
CHAPTER3: 1~2 hours
CHAPTER4: 1~2 hours
EPILOGUE: 1~2 hours

STORY, GRAPHICS & PROGRAMMING

FIFTHD

SPECIAL THANKS

​Andrew Warrick​

data.short_description: A Free, 2D Visual Novel / Adventure "来人 LIGHTWORKERS"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Officially supported hardware vendor drivers
